title: Next JS
description: this is a web-page based on next js boilerplate
heading: About
about_para1: A well-structured production ready Next.js boilerplate with Typescript a superscript of Javascript, Jest and enzyme for automated testing, Express js.
about_para2: an open source tool for developing UI components in isolation for React. SEO functionality (Search Engine Optimisation) which is a key to good ranking on Google and other search engines, using Server Side Rendring of next js, incorporated Formik, Baseweb as UI toolkit, language localization using next-i18next functionality, Sentry, easy deployment on vercel, for more information checkout the
